24641.name: UX writing status
24641.description:
Keep track of your UX writing copy for each text layer inside a frame.


Allow your team to follow the status of any copy while staying full in context, without leaving Figma.


As a UX writer or product designer, you will be able to identify the progress of the work that is being done for a copy inside a frame, you can set the following status for your text:

To do

In progress

To review

Done


The Plugin will add the status in the name of the layer.


Github

24093.name: Mark the page
24093.description: View the marked pages and quickly enter the marked page!

24800.name: Multi Renamer
24800.description:
Easy rename multi "INSTANCE names" or "COMPONENT names" or "FRAME names" at one time.


How to Use.


1. CHOOSE "Type" (INSTANCE or COMPONENT or FRAME)

2. CLICK "Get List"

3. EDIT names (NOT REMOVE UID)

4. CLICK "Rename"


--------------


一度に複数のインスタンスやコンポーネント、フレームの名前を変更したい時、規則性がなくて「置換しづらい」ことないですか？

このプラグイン全ての「インスタンス」や「コンポーネント」や「フレーム」の名前をリスト化し、リスト名を変更することで一度に大量の置換を行う事ができます。

もちろん、置換したいものだけのリストにすれば、そのリストだけが置換されます。


過去に作られた命名規則のないインスタンス名を一度に変更する際など是非使ってみてください。

24880.name: Auto Layout Reverse
24880.description:
Polyfill for auto-layout :


A common problem with a simple solution!

Run the plugin to add a reverse button to each auto-layout frame\component in the current page.

 

Great for creating bidirectional components for LTR and RTL languages, chat components, and more.


For more plugins and gifs with usage examples:

FigmaOP - open source Figma plugins->


Support My Work on Figma Plugins->

24687.name: typographyssimo-converter
24687.description:
Generate text styles via typographyssimo.jamillazarev.com


Usage

  • Generate text styles using https://typographyssimo.jamillazarev.com/
  • Click "For Figma" in the upper right corner
  • Run the plugin, Paste & press "Generate styles"


Keep in mind

  • A short link, properties & CSS will be attached to style in the description.
  • The plugin knows what you have already generated – you don't need to reconnect the styles if you don't change names. Just paste the new URL into the plugin.

24767.name: Lanhu Pro
24767.description:
蓝湖 Pro 是一个为企业量身打造的高效产品设计协同解决方案，加速企业数字化升级。可以无缝衔接产品、设计、研发流程，帮助团队降低沟通成本，缩短研发周期，大大提高工作效率。

使用蓝湖，帮助你完成以下任务：

  • 数字资产集中管理
  • 产品经理轻松表达需求
  • 设计师高效交付设计图
  • 工程师快速省心开发

24820.name: sizessimo-converter
24820.description:
Generate variables via sizessimo.jamillazarev.com


Dependency: variables plugin


Usage

  • Generate variables using https://sizessimo.jamillazarev.com/
  • Click "For Figma" in the upper right corner
  • Run the plugin, Paste & press "Run"
  • Install & run variables plugin


Keep in mind

  • A short link, properties & CSS will be attached to the hidden layer.
  • The plugin knows what you have already generated – you don't need to reconnect the variables if you don't change names. Just paste the new URL into the plugin and press “update variables” in variables plugin

24799.name: Don't Need
24799.description:
"Delete for now!"

"Next time!"

"Pend!"

Have you ever been in a sad situation like this?

This is the perfect plug-in for you.


How to

Simply select the FRAMES or COMPONENTS you no longer need and choose between 'Deleted', 'Pending', and 'Moved'.

(If you would like to use different wording, simply select "Customize".)


-------------------


せっかく頑張って作ったのに

「この画面・機能一旦なしで」

「一旦ペンディングで」

という台無しな一言…


Don't Needはこんな場面にピッタリのプラグインです。


使い方

一旦必要なくなったFRAMEやCOMPONENTを選択して「Deleted」「Pending」「Moved」から選ぶだけです。

（もし、他の文言を使いたい方は「Customize」を選択して文言を入れるだけです。）

24791.name: EasyFramer
24791.description:
Easily wrap your selected components, media or texts on a frame.

Only select all the resources you need to be wrapped on a frame, then you can run the plugin.


If you are a developer feel free to send pull requests on github.

24657.name: Monocle
24657.description: Inspector and editor for shared plugin data. Edit the shared metadata stored on each layer of your Figma file.

25055.name: Desi Ipsum
25055.description:
Plugin to generate placeholder text in Indian languages.

Create blocks of randomly generated text in Indian languages to fill your text layer. Select all the text layers you want to add text to, and click 'Generate'. Every click of 'Generate' button creates a fresh block of text.


What is Desi?

'Desi' is a word derived from Sanskrit 'Desa/Desam' (देश/देशम्) which means country, nation. 'Desi' word is used to describe the people, culture, languages, festivals, and products of Indian origin.


Currently supports 11 languages

  1. Hindi
  2. Marathi
  3. Sanskrit
  4. Tamil
  5. Kannada
  6. Telugu
  7. Malayalam
  8. Gujarati
  9. Bangla
  10. Odia
  11. Punjabi


Features

  • Generates requested number of words
  • Sentence contains 4-9 words
  • Paragraph contains 3-7 sentences
  • Language specific punctuation marks


Workflow

  1. Run plugin
  2. Select one or more text layers where you want to add generated text
  3. Enter the number and select type of text block such as Words, Sentences, or Paragraphs
  4. Select the language from dropdown list
  5. Click on 'Generate' to add 'Desi Ipsum' text to your canvas


Github link

24945.name: DesignGo
24945.description:
Простой, быстрый и удобный инструмент для коммуникации между дизайнером и клиентом

Оставляй комментарии и рисунки прямо в макете, отслеживай все изменения.

24347.name: OutSystems UI Plugin
24347.description: Accelerate your design to code journey. Style your next OutSystems application directly in Figma.
